name: Onyx - Vintage Nicaragua - Magnum
additionalNotes: Onyx Cigars are produced by Altadis U.S.A., the legendary company responsible for such famous brands as Montecristo, Romeo y Julieta, Aging Room, H. Upmann and many more. The original Onyx Reserve blend, released in 2000 to rave reviews, features an oily black Connecticut Broadleaf maduro wrapper, Nicaraguan binder, and fully aged long fillers from the Dominican Republic, Nicaragua, and Peru. Top notch construction, a great burn, and rich bold flavors of chocolate, raisins, espresso, earth, and spiceÂ
